name: Roll a Gun
description:
WARNING: The web build seems to have some rendering problems in firefox. Please use a Chromium browser or the executable Windows version for the best experience!

Your life is going down the drain. Gambling has left you poor and alone. You feel like you're going a bit crazy, specially because everything you see tries to kill you and is some sort of casino item.

Luckily, you know exactly how to get out of this issue: gambling! You can't help yourself from throwing a dice to decide just what lethal weapon in your arsenal you'll use to dispatch these fiendish beings.
